metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4209 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 5.0u65, 6u75, 7u60, and 8u5 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality and integrity via vectors related to JMX.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4209` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

icedtea-6-jre-cacao - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
icedtea-6-jre-jamvm - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-demo - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-jdk - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-jre - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-jre-headless - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-jre-lib - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-jre-zero - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
openjdk-6-source - 6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

icedtea-7-jre-jamvm - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-demo - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-jdk - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-jre - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-jre-headless - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-jre-lib - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-jre-zero - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-source - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
openjdk-7-tests - 7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> in lucid+, NetX and the plugin moved to the icedtea-web package jdstrand> sun-java6 is not redistributable, no longer in the archive and no longer tracked sun-java5 is EOL upstream and no longer tracked

criterions.comment: openjdk-6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6b32-1.13.4-4ubuntu0.14.04.1').
openjdk-7 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7u65-2.5.1-1ubuntu1~0.14.04.1').
